attributes.title: My Grandchildren photos we ERASED
attributes.review: When I opened this app I was so excited because Donald j Trump is my orange Jesus. However, when I opened the app my phone screen WENT BLACK. I took it to the store and they said there was a virus, so after time and a lot of money I had to get a new phone. I lost all my photos of my grandkids. I have never been so mad or furious at an app.

attributes.title: awful!
attributes.review: this app is so bad! it continuously glitches out everytime i open it. i have a brand new phone so it isn’t that. it sends me super loud notifications at night even when my ringer is off. i am completely DISGUSTED with this app. i was just on here to see whether i should vote for trump again and now i have my answer. NO.

attributes.title: Orange fingers
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app because I absolutely ADORE Donald J Trump he is my savior. After opening the app my finger started turning orange I don’t know if this is happened to anyone else?? I tried washing off my hands but it doesn’t work it’s like painted on me like a tan or something. So this app is getting one out of five stars I don’t think I’m going to vote for Trump anymore.

attributes.userName: uou dknt need to nnow my name
attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This is the hands down WORST app to ever be made. It was a waist of my time and if I could possibly give this app a negative 10, trust me, I would. Trump and his campaign waisted their money big time making this app. The app shows that not only do you hear about trumps wrongs, you see it yourself through a glass screen. Horrible, disgusting, saddening app

attributes.title: Glitches and Bugs
attributes.review: Every time I opened the app it would crash and go to my home screen. I tried re-installing, powering off my phone, and just waiting for a little bit. I know it has nothing to do with my phone because all of the other devices on it work just fine.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with our brilliant presidents campaign, but the app kept freezing and closing on the loading screen. When I finally did get further in and gave my personal information I kept getting spam calls... I’ve heard rumors that this app has been hacked and information leaked.

attributes.title: Worst president I’ve ever seen
attributes.review: Okay he is not helping the US at all at this point, and I’m not like other people who just say he’s blatantly racist but he has a bit of a loose leash when it comes to twitter and public speaking which I don’t really like. Not to mention he hasn’t done one of the main thing his campaign was built on, building the wall.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD 😰😓😱🍊

attributes.title: Would NOT recommend 😤😡
attributes.review: I was having an amazing evening and actually was very happy and all and i decided to download the app to see the experience and overall ambiance of it and i was NOT satisfied! I usually don’t review apps but i can make exceptions for especially bad apps very disappointed and hope it can improve greatly!😡😔

This is a huge no. I Download this and so then later I could write a bad review about it. It’s a bad app anyway so I deleted it ASAP. As a 14 year old this is a terrible app being ran by a terrible person. I would not recommended. If I could give this app 0 stars I would. Apple needs to take this off if the App Store.
